description: Insurance claim management tools for PI cases

tools.name: pip_waterfall
tools.description: Determine the correct PIP (Personal Injury Protection) insurer using Kentucky's statutory waterfall priority rules. Handles all scenarios including disqualification and KAC referral.
when_to_use: Opening a new MVA case - determine where to file PIP claim
Client was passenger in someone else's vehicle
Client doesn't have their own auto insurance
Need to determine if client qualifies for Kentucky Assigned Claims
tools.output_format: JSON with pip_insurer, recommendation, next_steps, template_to_use

exit_codes.1: KAC required - no standard coverage available

waterfall_logic_summary.step_1: Is client on TITLE of vehicle occupied? If yes AND insured → that vehicle's insurer. If yes AND uninsured → DISQUALIFIED
waterfall_logic_summary.step_2: Was vehicle occupied insured? If yes → that vehicle's insurer
waterfall_logic_summary.step_3: Does client have OWN auto insurance? If yes → client's insurer
waterfall_logic_summary.step_4: Does household member have auto insurance? If yes → household member's insurer
waterfall_logic_summary.step_5: None of the above → Kentucky Assigned Claims Plan (KAC)
